investigation_summary: Deep investigation into recent configuration changes in EasyR1 repository

findings.config_parameter_analysis: After examining all recent commits that modified examples/config.yaml, no commit was found where micro_batch_size_per_device_for_update was changed from 4 to 1. The current and historical values in the repository show these parameters have consistently been set to 4 and 16 respectively.
commits_examined: cb9166c77d6ec74540e21bdabcc1117268fabf6c - [worker] fix multi modal data oom (#454)

micro_batch_size_per_device_for_update.note: This parameter has remained constant at 4 throughout the examined commit history

micro_batch_size_per_device_for_experien.note: This parameter has remained constant at 16 throughout the examined commit history

issue_9.title: Training Memory Leak at various steps

issue_30.title: large rollout.n encounter OOM in training

issue_46.title: [功能请求]为实验一开始的推理阶段增加提示

verification_status.reason: The specific parameter change described (micro_batch_size_per_device_for_update from 4 to 1) does not exist in the repository commit history
verification_status.alternative_finding: OOM-related commit cb9166c77d6ec74540e21bdabcc1117268fabf6c '[worker] fix multi modal data oom' was found but it modified protocol and worker code, not the config.yaml batch size parameters
